name: smart_home_automation
description: Control smart home devices (lights, thermostat, locks, camera, speakers) by manipulating objects and calling their methods to automate home scenes.

turns.query: I'm going to watch a movie in the living room. Set the mood - dim the lights to 20% brightness.
I'm leaving home. Check all doors and lock any that are unlocked. Then turn off all lights in the house, but make sure the security camera stays on and starts recording.

It's bedtime and the house is at 20°C. I want it warmer for sleeping - set the thermostat to 22°C and calculate how many minutes it will take to reach that temperature (it heats at 0.5°C per 10 minutes), storing the result in warmup_time_minutes. Then turn off all lights except the bedroom light - dim that to 20% for reading. Lock all doors and ensure the security camera is recording.
